name: Hotel Royal Orchid, Jaipur

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for 2 nights, we found the staff to be very friendly and Indian restaurant turned out to be one of the best we tried throughout our trip. Breakfast's were also ok but limited for any western fare.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: The rooms were large enough and clean
reviews.title: Lovely time spend in Royal Orchid. Fantastic Staff.
"Good value for money" wanna come again...:-)
reviews.text: My name´s Yogesh Alamchandani from Madrid (Spain) n we did a short stay in the Royal Orchid for about 4 days for a wedding.
The whold experience was great, lovely food, Great service.. wonderfull n soo much helping staff.
reviews.title: The most helpful staff ever

reviews.text: we came across with Mr. Sunil who is the Manager i suppose and a girl named Meenakshi, she was in the reception. Soo much helping staff both them turned out.
reviews.title: A nice property in Jaipur

reviews.text: Royal Orchid, Jaipur is one of the finest hotels to stay in Jaipur. The rooms are spacious, clean and quite comfortable. The decor, furnishing, bathroom, amenities are upto the mark. Their buffet is sumptuous and well laid out. Highly recommended, families can have a gala time!
reviews.title: Exceeds all expectations

reviews.text: The RO Jaipur is one of the best hotels in Jaipur. The rooms are very neat, clean and well-built. It also has all the latest amenities that are required in a room. One of the best things I noticed was the iPhone dock which is very rare to find.
reviews.title: Good Property

reviews.text: Great property... Great location... Near to the airport and most the offices. Very comfortable rooms with all required amenities. Excellent buffet. Very efficient, honest and helpful staff. Ms. Menakshi was very curtious and helpful.
reviews.title: Excellent Property & Courteous Staff

reviews.text: I lost my mobile in the hotel,which was not even mentioned to the hotel staff. i was thinking that have missed it at the other property where i went to have dinner with friends. Mr. Anuragh Kotia, the security officer, found it and made it a point to reach me and hand it over me safely. That's actually a very rare case and haven't heard of.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay!

reviews.text: Would strongly recommend the property to all friends & family travelling to Jaipur.
reviews.title: Excellent room and great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was our second time stay at the royal orchid hotel and it was simply amazing. The hotel has everything that is needed and it is very well maintained. Rooms are very clean and comfortable with a very soothing contemporary decor and a see through glass between the room and the bathroom. Room size is good and the Bathroom is quite huge with a separate shower area and a separate bath tub area even in our standard category room. Coffee shop was ok but the tiger trail restaurant is one of our favorites.....we stayed during the peak summer and we also got a very competitive price considering the other options.....its not centrally located but very close to the airport and world trade park shopping mall and convention centre.....overall it truly offers a 4 star experience.
reviews.title: Good hotel near the airport

reviews.text: Great hotel ... Good service.... Staff very helpful.... Ms Meenakshi Jhamb .... Guest relationship manager was every curtious, helpful .... Overall one of the best hotels I ever stayed. Good location... Close to airport and city ..... Have stayed here so many times in last 2 years ... And the staff never let's you down... The puppet show, the salsa bar... Tiger grill restaurant .. All are exceptionally great ... Thanks Meenakshi again and her committed staff....
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Had a very comfortable stay thanks to the warm staff. Rooms were clean and well designed. Mr. Sunil Metha, Lobby Mgr was very helpful & courteous.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel to stayin

reviews.text: The food is great! But costly still I highly recommend
reviews.title: Truly the Royal Orchid of Jaipur: Best Front Desk Bends Backwards to Help Guests

reviews.text: Its a great hotel for family and business people alike!
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in the catagory

reviews.text: We stayed here in March 2013 - family of 4 (children aged 9 and 4). We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and cannot fault the hotel at all. The staff and management were very friendly and the services were fantastic. The first night we were upgraded to a room with plunge pool - which the kids loved! We spend some time in the rooftop swimming pool area - drinks delivered poolside and a lifeguard on hand.
reviews.title: Excellent stay in Jaipur

reviews.text: I happened to stay at this hotel as our residential conference was held during 27 to 29 June 2013. The facilities at the hotel were very good and for a change enjoyed the food at our residential conferences.. Rooms are spacious enough and comfortable and serves very well if you are on a working holiday like mine (as it was a residential conference)... Loved the concept of private jacuzzis in some of the rooms (though I didn't stay in one of those rooms)... Staff was courteous and agreed for a late-checkout quite easily as I had a late flight from the city... And the best part is the location... very convenient as located very near to the airport..
reviews.title: Excellent stay for business trip

reviews.text: Had a very comfortable stay thanks to the warm staff. Rooms were clean and well designed. I was upgraded into the room with the Personal Jacuzzi's thanks to Ms.Meenakshi at the reception who is very courteous and helpful.
reviews.title: Best Value Hotel in Jaipur

reviews.text: The food is great! I highly recommend the drinks at the Salsa Lounge Bar!!
reviews.title: Royal Orchid....is awesome
Long stay at Royal Orchid
reviews.text: Its a great hotel for family and business people alike!

description: Strategically located just 2.5 kms from Jaipur airport and 10 kms from the city railway station, Hotel Royal Orchid with its elegant furnishing, decor and blend of sophistication, flamboyance with a relaxed attitude make this an ideal stay for all discerning travellers. The guests can calm their senses at the roof-top swimming pool or indulge in gastronomic delights at ‘Tiger Trail’ and at the 24 hour coffee shop ‘Limelight and can even lighten their spirit at ‘Salsa’- the signature lounge bar after a day of hectic bustle.This upscale 5 star property houses 126 rooms along with 9 plunge pool rooms which includes a plunge pool suite with the finest amenities and elegant furnishings. Its banqueting facility, with ample parking space , luscious lawns and a large pre- function area makes it an ideal venue not only for video conferences, product launches but also a perfect destination for weddings .Hotel Royal Orchid Jaipur is one such dream wedding destination ’ which makes your wedding a charming and unforgettable experience.Traveling to Jaipur and staying at the hotel will surely leave you mesmerized with a memory which will want you coming back for more
